description: This notification is sent by AC when CAPWAP tunnel becomes up.
By this way, NMS will immediately know tunnel up event.
It is unnecessary to identify whether it is control or data
tunnel.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTunnelSetupTrap A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlUpInfo i 1 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr a 192.0.2.1 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: To uniquely identify the CAPWAP tunnel set up between the AP
identified by APID and a specific AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID

description: Represents the reason for tunnel up.
The following values are supported:
up(1) - The AP joined AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlUpInfo

description: Represents name of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName

description: Represents IP address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr

description: Represents IPv6 address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with
the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime

description: This notification is sent by AC when CAPWAP tunnel becomes down.
By this way, NMS will immediately know tunnel down event.
It is unnecessary to identify whether it is control or data
tunnel.

event.Summary: CAPWAP tunnel is down due to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTunnelDownTrap A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnInfo i 1 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr a 192.0.2.1 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnCount i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPSysName s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: To uniquely identify the CAPWAP tunnel set up between the AP
identified by APID and a specific AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID

description: Represents the reason for tunnel down.
The following values are supported:
tunnelTimeout(1), - When AC detects the tunnel is broken
- it will notify NMS.
keyUpdateFailure(2), - rekey process is failed, tunnel will
- be broken.
apReset(3), - Administrator reset AP.
apCrash(4), - AP reboot for system crash.
apDeleted(5) - Delete AP from AC and trigger
- tunnel down.
apCfgChange(6) - The configuration for AP was changed.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnInfo

description: Represents name of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName

description: Represents IP address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr

description: Represents IPv6 address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with
the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr

description: Reprsents how many times that the tunnel between AC and AP has down.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnCount

description: Represents system name of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPSysName

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime

description: This trap is sent by AC when AC switches from master to slave
or from slave to master.
Represents status which the AC switches to.
The following values are supported:
masterToSlave - The AC switches from master to slave.
slaveToMaster - The AC switches from slave to master.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtTrapBackupSwitchInfo

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime

description: This trap is sent by AC when load-balance is enabled on AC.
Represents which kind load balance is enabled by AC.
The following values are supported:
traffic mode load-balancing: traffic snapshot is considered.
session mode load-balancing: the number of users associated
with the AP/radio is considered.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11LoadBalanceType

description: Represents the value of load balance threshold.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11LoadBalanceThreshold

description: This notification will be sent when STA is full on AC.

event.Summary: Maximum number of STA $v1 reached on AC

description: Represents the max number of STA on AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACMaxStaNum

description: This notification will be sent when AC switchs from standby to active
or from standby to active.
Represents status which the AC switches to.
The following values are supported:
activeToStandby - The AC switches from active to standby.
standbyToActive - The AC switches from standby to active.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11ACStatusSwitchInfo

description: Represents the NMS IP address of master AC.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::h3cDot11SourceACNmsIP
